explains: n. 错觉，幻觉；幻想，错误的观念
wordGroup: optical illusion 视错觉，错视；光幻觉

sentences.en: Mirrors in a room often give an illusion of space.
sentences.cn: 房间里的镜子常给人一种空间增大的错觉。

sentences.en: The idea of absolute personal freedom is an illusion.
sentences.cn: 绝对个人自由的观念是一种幻想。

sentences.en: He could no longer distinguish between illusion and reality.
sentences.cn: 他再也分不清幻想与现实之间的区别了。
